name: dowdy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of clothes or the person wearing them) not attractive or fashionable: a dowdy skirt She looked dowdy and plain. Synonyms
frowzy disapproving
frumpy disapprovingOpposite
glamorous

(esp. of clothes or the person wearing them) unattractive and not stylish, often because of being old-fashioned
